MessageHeader.description: A single header for an email message.

Body.description: Raw source of message. If no dump is available this will return an empty string.

Cc.description: Recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma seperated. Max 50.

From.description: The sender email address. Must have a registered and confirmed Sender Signature.

HtmlBody.description: If no TextBody specified HTML email message

ReplyTo.description: Reply To override email address. Defaults to the Reply To set in the sender signature.

Tag.description: Email tag that allows you to categorize outgoing emails and get detailed statistics.

TextBody.description: If no HtmlBody specified Plain text email message

To.description: Recipient email address. Multiple addresses are comma seperated. Max 50.

TrackOpens.description: Activate open tracking for this email.

SendEmailResponse.description: The standard response when a postmark message is sent

SentCountsResponse.description: The result of a get sent counts operation.

TemplateID.description: The ID associated with the template.

TextBody.description: The content to use for the TextBody when this template is used to send email.

Templates API.description: Basic information for each Template returned from the query.

TotalCount.description: The total number of Templates API associated with this server.

HtmlBody.description:
The html body content to validate. Must be specified if Subject or
TextBody are not. See our template language documentation for more
information on the syntax for this field.

InlineCssForHtmlTestRender.description:
When HtmlBody is specified, the test render will have style blocks
inlined as style attributes on matching html elements. You may disable
the css inlining behavior by passing false for this parameter.

Subject.description:
The subject content to validate. Must be specified if HtmlBody or
TextBody are not. See our template language documentation for more
information on the syntax for this field.

TestRenderModel.description: The model to be used when rendering test content.

TextBody.description:
The text body content to validate. Must be specified if HtmlBody or
Subject are not. See our template language documentation for more
information on the syntax for this field.
